## Properties

| Property     | Attribute    | Description                                            | Type      | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ----------- |

| `responsive` | `responsive` | If the component should adapt it's width automatically | `boolean` | `false`     |
